short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Manager Pro - save tabs as groups and revisit them in the future

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing TabMaster, a powerful browser extension designed to revolutionize your tab management experience. Tired of drowning in a sea of open tabs? Struggling to keep track of your browsing sessions? TabMaster is here to save the day.

With TabMaster, you have complete control over your tabs, allowing you to effortlessly organize and group them to suit your needs. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to streamlined browsing!


Here's what TabMaster has to offer:

1. Tab Grouping: Create custom groups for your tabs based on your preferences, projects, or interests. Whether you're researching multiple topics, working on various tasks, or simply separating personal and professional browsing, TabMaster keeps everything neatly organized.

2. Customizable Tab Groups: Tailor each tab group to your liking by assigning unique names, descriptions. Personalize your browsing experience and easily identify specific groups with a quick glance.

3. Seamless Group Management: Effortlessly add, remove, or rearrange tabs within a group. Tab Manager Pro ensures a smooth and intuitive user experience.

4. Quick Tab Access: Access your tab groups anytime, anywhere with just a click.

And much more
